price: Më i arsyeshmi ndër ta tha: “A nuk ju thashë unë se duhet ta lartësoni Allahun?!”
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
